The right knee and the left elbow are bent at right angle.
81.lhand_pose: The rings, the right index and the middles are near other fingers and the left pinky is bent to maximum with both thumbs wide apart while the left index is bent to the max. It is slightly spread to other fingers , the left middle, the left ring and the left thumb are bent.
81.rhand_pose: The right middle, the right pinky, the right index and the right ring are bent sharply. The right thumb is nearly bent.
